for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, s) = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if l.count(0) == 0 or l.count(1) == 0:
        ans = 'no'
    else:
        dfd_price = min((p[i] for i in range(n) if l[i] == 0))
        fwd_price = min((p[i] for i in range(n) if l[i] == 1))
        ans = 'yes' if dfd_price + fwd_price + s <= 100 else 'no'
    print(ans)
